entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
